cast.name: 安吉莉·芭雅妮 Angeli Bayani

introduction: Set in the most unconventional and most upscale university campus, two young men will compete for the sole honor of being the Campus King.Ben Martinez has already won the title 3 times.Samuel Quirino is the new student who gets easily noticed and becomes the challenger for the title.When Sam becomes a tough competitor inside and out the classroom, Ben will decide to quit the popularity contest.Ben has never recovered from the scarred memories of abuse from his father, and he continues to suffer even more at present with a mother who is becoming more eccentric each day.Sam is still grieving the death of his activist boyfriend.Both will cling to each other to forget their painful precedents.When the clash of popularity becomes affectionate, Ben & Sam has to fight for their relationship and happiness until the very end.
